activities: Live Earth is collecting first name, last name, email address and city for a petition to encourage world leaders to sign a meaningful agreement at COP21 in Paris in December, 2015.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: All petition data (first name, last name, email address, city); we do not plan to collect manually processed data, but if we receive any, it will be covered.
